author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IVO NOW A REMNANT LOW, AND THIS IS THE LAST ADVISORY...
summary: ...IVO NOW A REMNANT LOW, AND THIS IS THE LAST ADVISORY... As of 8:00 AM PDT Mon Aug 11 the center of Ivo was located near 23.2, -119.6 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IVO NOW A REMNANT LOW, AND THIS IS THE LAST ADVISORY... As of 8:00 AM PDT Mon Aug 11 the center of Ivo was located near 23.2, -119.6 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

title: Summary - Post-Tropical Cyclone Ivo (EP4/EP092025)
